name: Steady, Steady
Lore: 'The Gungan army hoped that by initiating a conflict at the battle plains, they could draw the Trade Federation''s forces away from Amidala''s real plan.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. If you have two Gungans with different card titles at Battle Plains, your Force drains are +2 there. While two underwater sites on table, your Gungans and creature vehicles are immune to attrition < 4 where your Fambaa is present. (Immune to Alter.)',
